concept.title: Getting Started with Workforce Management
concept.shortdesc: Workforce Management offers simple and effortless solutions for employees, managers, and administrators.

conbody.p: Workforce Management contains the Time feature and the optional Scheduling feature. Time includes the Time Off and Allowances feature.
The following self-paced learning resources are available for Time, Time Off and Allowances, and Scheduling:

li.xref: Getting Started with Time Off and Allowances for Administrators
Getting Started with Workforce Management for Administrators
Getting Started with Workforce Management for Managers
Getting Started with Workforce Management for Employees

section.title: Time Off and Allowances
section.p: With Time Off and Allowances, employees can easily request time off and managers can gain insight into their team's time off.

ul.li: Enables employees to view real-time and forecast balances, easily request time off, and view their team time off calendar
Enables managers to have insight into their team's time off, update a team member's time off balance, and create a request on behalf of an employee
Provides the ability to govern coverage and blackout dates and to view a team time off calendar

section.title: Time
section.p: Time provides an effortless time-tracking solution that increases productivity and empowers employees to take action quickly.

ul.li: Enables employees to effortlessly clock in and out, seamlessly transfer and record labor, edit the meal waiver status each day, and submit timesheets for approval
Enables managers to act on employee timesheets, view labor metric defaults and upcoming team time off, and gain insights into team time and labor summary information

section.title: Scheduling
section.p: Scheduling offers self-service scheduling capabilities in an easy-to-use interface. Scheduling helps organizations better manage employee shifts and gain greater visibility into their workforce.

ul.li: Enables employees to enter their availability and preferences, view their schedules, and swap and drop schedules
Enables managers to schedule employees based upon standard and custom labor metrics; reassign employee shifts with drag-and-drop capability; and post schedules at an employee, day, or period level
Provides a template library to help managers with faster scheduling for their workforce
